Parameters: int: the amount of pixels to scroll by vertically
scrollListBy(android.widget.ListView, in.Description: Scrolls the list items within the view by a specified number of pixels.

Returns: true if the list can be scrolled in the specified direction, false otherwise.
Parameters: int: Negative to check scrolling up, positive to check scrolling down.
canScrollList(android.widget.ListView, i.Description: Check if the items in the list can be scrolled in a certain direction.
